CustomField.description: HTML field that allows user to put dependencies of the requirement and capture what is needed outside of the requirement details in order to implement the requirement successfully
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field to capture key information related to the REQ such as system limitations, prerequisite permissions/configurations, process decisions, and/or agreed to conditions such as "REQ will be accomplished using native configuration capability vs. code.â€œ
CustomField.label: Assumptions
